p: Acrylic rosin ester diethylamine tertiary amine surfactant is a sticky paste. It can be prepared from acrylpimaryl chloride, N,N-diethylethanolamine and hydrochloric acid according to Scheme 29 [ 128]. This product, in a mixture with soapnut saponin exhibits noteworthy surface activity and emulsification ability to apply in pharmacy, cosmetics and commodity chemicals [ 128].
